title: Intro to SEO for Dentists
description:
This eBook covers:

  • Basics of SEO and why it’s important for dentists
  • Keyword research tips tailored for dental practices
  • On-page SEO techniques to optimize your website
  • Link-building strategies to improve your site’s authority
  • How to track and measure your SEO success

Boost your practice’s online visibility.

SEO is a powerful tool for attracting new patients to your practice. Our eBook covers fundamental strategies that will help you rank higher in search engine results, making it easier for potential patients to find you.

Start ranking higher with this beginner-friendly SEO guide.

Download now

Invest in long-term growth.

Implementing effective SEO strategies is a long-term investment that pays off by consistently bringing in new patients. Our eBook provides actionable insights that you can start using immediately to see results.

Take the first step towards a more visible and successful dental practice. Download our free Intro to SEO for Dentists eBook and start optimizing your online presence today.

Please fill out the form to receive your free resource.

title: The Complete Guide to Dental Marketing
description:
This guide covers:

  • Research from sources like Google & McKinsey about how today's patients find providers
  • How branding affects patient perceptions and can help your practice stand out, establish loyalty, and build value
  • 12 modern brand styles you can begin using for your practice today
  • The elements that make a dental website effective-- from appearing in more searches to generating more patients
  • How SEO works for dental practices and how patients use search at each stage in their journey to care-- from provider selection to treatment acceptance and more.

Why every dentist needs a strong marketing strategy.

In today’s competitive landscape, having a robust marketing strategy is essential for dental practices to stand out and thrive. Marketing is not just about attracting new patients; it’s about building a recognizable brand, fostering patient loyalty, and ensuring consistent growth. Effective marketing can help you communicate your expertise, enhance your reputation, and ultimately grow your practice.

Please fill out the form to receive your free resource.
excerpt: Our guide to dental marketing offers comprehensive strategies and actionable tips to help dental professionals attract and retain patients. This free resource covers the latest marketing techniques, from social media tactics to patient engagement methods, ensuring your practice thrives in a competitive market.
content:

title: Dental Treatment Plan Template
description:
Our dental treament plan proposal template includes the following easy-to-customize layouts:

  • Treatment Overview Page: Explain the high-level goals and expected outcomes of treatment, along with a phased treatment timeline.
  • Clinical Findings Page: Share information and photos of the patient's current dental condition
  • Proposed Treatment Timeline: An overview of the major milestones in the patient's treatment plan along with dates.
  • Comprehensive Treatment Plan & Budget: An easy-to-understand breakdown of the specific treatment, dates and costs at each step of treatment
  • Payment & Financial Info Page: Set expectations around payment policies including accepted methods of payment, insurance coverage, financing options and more.
  • Helpful resources: Share educational blog posts or pre and post op instructions to help patients prepare for treatment
  • Signature Page: A place for patients to sign to accept treatment

Professionally present treatment proposals for large cases

Hate handing patients a print-out of treatment codes? Our free treatment plan template is a solution that's sure to impress. It's a beautifully formatted way to share treatment proposals with patients, especially those considering costly or complicated treatment plans like all on x or cosmetic smile restorations. 

Our template is easy to understand, displaying the patient's full treatment plan in a breakdown by phase so patients can understand their full treatment roadmap-- from what's happening to when it's scheduled and how much they should expect to budget for each phase of the plan. 

Please fill out the form to receive your free resource.
excerpt: Help move high-value cases towards treatment acceptance with this free dental treatment plan template. Outline a treatment overview, share a timeline and detail costs in a professional and personalized format.

title: Patient Review Request Templates for Handout, Email, and Text
description:
Our review request handout template includes:

  • Editable Canva handout design for custom text and logos
  • Polite and professional message requesting a review
  • Guidance to help patients find you on the 4 biggest review sites: Google, Facebook, Yelp, and Healthgrades
  • Step-by-step guide to using the design effectively
  • 3 email patient review request templates
  • 3 text patient review request templates

Show prospective patients your success stories.

Great reviews make the difference when patients are looking for trusted practices in their neighborhood. Most patients now start their search for a new dentist or doctor using Google or another search engine, and 94% of patients use reviews to evaluate providers. But it can be hard to know how to get patient reviews without feeling like you’re begging. Even if your staff remembers to ask at check-out, patients are likely to forget by the time they get home. That’s where our convenient handout comes in.

Take the guesswork out of getting reviews for your practice.

We designed this handout to be user-friendly, easily customizable, and effective. Whether you want to tweak the text or adjust the design elements, the included Canva design makes it simple to create the perfect post for your practice.

Give patients the gentle reminder they need to help your practice grow and thrive. Watch your reviews grow–and your reputation along with it! Download now and never miss another great patient review opportunity again.

Please fill out the form to receive your free resource.
excerpt: Make it as easy as possible for your patients to share the love with this patient review request template. Slip this helpful reminder into their swag bag at routine visits, or as part of their informational packet following more complex procedures.

title: AI Knowledge Snapshot
description:
See what AI knows about your practice with our free, instant AI Knowledge Snapshot.

The first step to winning AI search recommendations is making sure that AIs can gather important information about your business and that key details aren't invisible due to technical issues or formats that they can't read. With our AI Knowledge Snapshot, you'll learn: 

  • How your practice is described to a prospective patient
  • What details (hours, insurance, reviews, services) are visible or missing
  • How consistent your information appears across sources like ChatGPT and Google Gemini

Go a step further and learn whether AI recommends your practice in important searches with our enhanced AI Visibility Report.

Knowing what AI platforms know about you is just the first step—what really matters is whether they recommend you to patients who fit your ideal patient profile, based on the services, amenities and insurance acceptance they’re looking for.

In the Full AI Visibility Report, we:

  • Build patient-style prompts designed to trigger a recommendation for your office.
  • Test those prompts in ChatGPT, Gemini, and Claude.
  • Show you the exact responses—highlighting whether you or a competitor is recommended.
Order your full report Please fill out the form to receive your free resource.
excerpt: Search is changing fast. Patients are increasingly asking AI assistants for dentist and doctor recommendations instead of just using Google. Our free AI knowledge snapshot will help you take the first step towards achieving AI visibility: learning what AI knows about your practice.

title: Social Media for Dentists Post Templates
description:
Our social media for dentists post templates include:

  • Editable Canva social media post templates specifically for dentists
  • 12 unique posts, including several multi-page carousel posts
  • Customizable designs for before and after photos and patient reviews
  • Step-by-step guide to using the designs effectively
  • Licensed photos and design elements you can use without worrying about copyright issues

Show up when patients look for you.

Social media now plays a key role in helping patients choose the right healthcare provider. It’s a great place to let them get a closer look at your office and your team’s smiling faces. But you don’t have to do goofy dances or daily photoshoots to make it work. (Unless you’re into that!)

You can use your dental social media accounts to provide valuable educational information to help your patients understand their needs and what you have to offer. It’s also a great way to expand your digital footprint and support your SEO and advertising efforts. The key is to make sure your social media profiles look polished and professional.

Make a great impression with effective social media for dentists.

We designed these templates to be user-friendly, easily customizable, and effective. Whether you want to tweak the text or adjust the design elements, the included Canva design makes it simple to create the perfect post for your practice.

The key to successful social media marketing for dentists is consistency. But it can be hard to find time in your staff’s busy schedules to create content.

That’s where Patientli comes in. We’re proud to provide social media for dentists as part of our Growth package. Learn more about our social media marketing services here!

Please fill out the form to receive your free resource.
excerpt: These days, social media is a necessity. One of the first things patients will do when considering a healthcare provider is to look them up on socials. You don’t need to go viral doing funny dances, but it can be hard to build trust without polished and presentable content. Our social media post templates are a great place to start building your presence!
